description.value: Whether you're shoving opponents with a shield or a large weapon, you've learned to push them even further. Increase the distance you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Shove] your opponent with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Aggressive Block] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Brutish Shove] to 10 feet on a success or 20 feet on a critical success. When you use Aggressive Block, you can choose whether the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] or Shoved. When you make a Brutish Shove, you also Shove the target 5 feet on a failure.
